measurements_data.comments: LF: Calculated based on the amount of waste landfilled or dumped in 2010 compared to the amount of waste generated in 2011; RE: Average recycling rate derived from the recycling rates of Lautoka City (8.1 percent) and Nadi Town (2.8 percent)
